programme.title: Life Song
programme.desc: Beyram returns to his native Istanbul to reconcile with his close friend, and they agree to marry their children Kerim and Melek when they grow up. Kerim grew up in Germany; but his father forces him to return and marry Melek, but Hulya, Melek's younger sister, wants to marry him.

programme.title: Dirou Niya
programme.desc: The comedy takes place at a working-class cafe located in the heart of a neighborhood, where the characters are passionate about by football, and it's always the talk of the hour, especially with the presence of Mahmoud and Al Kushi, two ex-footballers fighting over glory.

programme.title: My Home My Destiny
programme.desc: Zeynep is a young law student who finds herself torn between her two mothers. She has been trying for years to equalize the two parties and is appreciative of her mother's genuine sacrifices, but she also works hard to fulfill her mother's other ambitions.

programme.title: My Siblings
programme.desc: The events of the series revolve around the life and fate of four siblings after the death of their father, as they are forced to struggle in life and face some obstacles in their way.

programme.title: Portreh
programme.desc: On the recommendation of his father's former sweetheart, Hazem becomes the editor-in-chief of an economic magazine. As he falls in love with Rima, the niece of his father's ex, trouble soon follows since an old feud has Hazem's parents and Rima at odds over the history with Randa.

programme.title: Eursan akhar zman
programme.desc: In each episode of the series, a groom proposes to marry Hikmat, the beautiful, educated young woman, who holds a doctorate in pharmacy and owns a pharmacy in the capital. As she comes from a well-off family, she is not in a hurry to choose a suitor from among the many men who ask for her hand.

programme.title: Return My Morning
programme.desc: Love brings together a successful man, Nabil, who has been searching for love a lot, and Raneem. Throughout the series, we see their extremely romantic story and also monitor their attitudes and interactions with their social surroundings.

programme.title: Sihr El Sharq
programme.desc: The series revolves around an English lady called Jane Digby,who's deeply fascinated by the East. She marries Sheikh Majool Al - Musallab ,who is a Badawi tribe leader and loves him dearly.

programme.title: Torjoman El-Ashwak
programme.desc: The show tells the story of three friends who decide to adopt the left-wing ideology. After each goes their way, one of them starts taking up Sufism and one maintains his leftist principles, which gets him into a lot of trouble. The third one decides to leave Syria, but returns after the civil war to find his missing daughter.

programme.title: Forsa Akhera
programme.desc: The story of a woman whose husband has died. She and her son move to live with his family. Afterwards, her relationship with another man causes many conflicts in the family.

programme.desc: In season 6, new interesting adventures await the five girls who used to live together in one house, but this time after they go through marriage experiences and enter the world of motherhood.

programme.desc: The tribulations of the "Abu Arab" family and their lives in an old, small town in Damascus.

programme.title: Elle Maloush Kbeer

programme.title: Elle Maloush Kbeer
programme.desc: As Ghazal's father forces her to marry a wealthy businessman despite the big age difference between them, the circumstances force her to toughen up in order to deal with those around her, as she gets to know the young man Seif El Khedewy and falls for him.

programme.title: She Looks Great (Ep76)
programme.desc: Bollywood, Romance, Drama 2021 Priya lives in her family home with her mother and sisters. She suffers in her life and believes that there is no place for love in her, after her lover left her to marry her sister. Nakuul Mehta, Disha Parmar, Amit Singh Thakur, Rohan Kapoor, Alefia Kapadia, Ekta Kapoor, Sahir Raza

programme.title: Margaret
programme.desc: A British woman marries a Khaleeji and lives in Arab society. After her husband's death, she becomes responsible for her family, as her life intertwines with the lives of those around her, and many clashes occur due to her unfamiliarity with some Arab traditions.

programme.title: Progeny Of Al Aghrab (Ep8)
programme.desc: People, Thriller, Drama 2021 Presenting the story of a man from upper Egypt who is accused of murder; after spending jail time, he returns to revenge from his worst enemies. Amir Karara, Ahmed El Sakka, Mai Omar, Ahmed Malek, Ahmad Dash, Mohamed Samy, Mohamed Samy

programme.title: Wasiyat Badr
programme.desc: The events explore the relationship between fathers and sons, through the story of Badr, who leaves a will that must be executed so that his children have their huge inheritance. But it separates them in life for a year before they can get the inheritance, as each one of them starts from scratch.

programme.title: Silk Market (Ep10)
programme.desc: Drama 2021 After one of Imran's children is kidnapped by a stranger, problems increase and cause the family to mourn. Bassam Kousa, Salom Hdad, Nadine Tahseeine bek, Fadi Sobeih, Al Mathna Sobh, Saif Reda Hamid

programme.title: Be My Sunshine (Ep63)
programme.desc: Romance, Comedy 2021 Hazira travels to a remote island to explore a land her bosses want to take to establish a resort. She meets Poyraz, a young man who owns a small olive factory. Without knowing, she ruins his work. Ayca Aysin Turan, Alp Navruz, Nihan Büyükagaç, Ipek Tenolcay, Bülent Çolak, Ali Bilgin, Özgür Sevimli, Aksel Bonfil, Yesim Citak, Yelda Eroglu, Dilek Iyigün, Emine Yildirim

programme.title: Nasl El Aghrab
programme.desc: In the wake of a fight that left half the members of Ghefran and Assaf's families dead, the latter is released from prison to try and restore the balance of power between him and his archenemy Gherfan, especially as the latter had married Assaf's beloved ex-wife and raised his son.

programme.title: Beirut's Bride (Ep50)
programme.desc: Romance, Drama 2019 A young businessman falls in love with a female singer, but his mother doesn't accept their relationship and tries to separate them by all means. Dhaffer Alabedin, Karmen Bsebas, Takla Chamoun, Joe Torad, Mohamed Al-Ahmed, Imra Kabakusak, Nadine Gaber

programme.title: Souq Al-Harir
programme.desc: The series sheds light on the period between 1950 and 1960 in Syria, with a focus on certain social stories, including that of Gharib who lost his memory as a child and is trying to find his way back to his family, and Omran who is a polygamist merchant living with his mother.

programme.title: Without Restraint (Ep9)
programme.desc: Drama, Romance 2021 Ghazal is trapped in an unwanted marriage to a controlling businessman due to his power and her family's passiveness. However, everything changes when her heart and Seif El Khedewy's heart are united by fearless love. Yasmin Abd Al Aziz, Ahmed Al Awady, Khaled Al Sawy, Dina Fouaad, Khaled Sarhan, Amr Mahmoud Yasin, Mustafa Fikry

programme.title: Be My Sunshine
programme.desc: On Swallow Island, the paths of businesswoman Haziran and gorgeous young man Poyraz collide, and love blossoms as a result of their conflicting personalities.

programme.title: 30 Youm
programme.desc: Tarek Helmy is a young married psychiatrist who has a daughter named Farida. On her first birthday, a patient called Tawfiq Al-Masry comes to Tarek, explaining to him an experiment he wants to carry out: he will pick someone, "The Chosen", and put him through a cycle of self-destructive crises over thirty days.

programme.title: Al-Heiba
programme.desc: Alia lives with her husband and their son in a European country. When the husband dies, she returns to Lebanon to bury him, only to discover that his family wants to take her son away, unless she marries his brother Jabal. She also discovers that her husband's family are arms smugglers.

programme.title: Flight of Dreams
programme.desc: Sandhu's family comes from a small village in Punjab, however, as the family dreams of immigrating to Canada, the dreams of the two sisters Tejo and Jasmine soon change when fate brings them a different reality.

programme.title: Bab Al-Reih
programme.desc: Addressing the issue of the widespread violence that has taken over society, the series tells the story of a mailman who struggles with the fact that written mail is no longer being used, as he balances his professional struggles with the love he has for his family, especially his blind daughter.

programme.title: Bayn qalbayn
programme.desc: A romantic social drama that deals with the love story of the girl Ariam, who defended her love against the tough conditions she's living in at the time. She fell in love with Bashar despite being married to another.

programme.title: Nasibi Wa Qesmetik
programme.desc: Connected but separate episodes dealing with 15 different topics, divided into 3 episodes each topic, discussing the relationship between men and women, the problems that occur between them, and how they can be overcome.

programme.title: Chrysalis
programme.desc: Nalan is a beautiful girl, who wins everyone's love with her kindness. She graduated with honors from the best schools in Turkey, however, she does not know anything about her parents except that her parents died in a car accident when she was young. She works as an interior architect at Koroglu Company, which owns an international hotel chain. Nalan meets the owner's son in the cafeteria, and it seems that this meeting will be the beginning of major transformations in their lives.

programme.desc: Y gair newydd heddiw yw 'eli haul'. Hari gaiff ei ddewis i chwilio amdano ond tybed i ble'r aiff? Hari's chosen to look for the sun cream, but where will he find it?

programme.title: Yr Ysgol
programme.desc: Heddiw bydd criw Ysgol Llanrug ac Ysgol Sant Curig yn chwarae gyda phob math o gerbydau. The children play with all sorts of vehicles and Emily goes on a steam train.

programme.title: Octonots Yr Octonots a'r Aligator Bach - Season 1, Episode 1
Octonots
programme.desc: Mae Harri yn gwarchod aligator bach ond pan fydd hwnnw'n dianc o'r Octofad, rhaid i Harri a gweddill yr Octonots ei achub. Harri adopts a baby alligator but it escapes!

programme.title: Ysbyty Cyw Bach Dod ar Frys - Season 1, Episode 1
Ysbyty Cyw Bach
programme.desc: Mae Cyw yn gorfod mynd ar frys i Ysbyty Ciw Bach mewn ambiwlans. Cyw is rushed to hospital in an ambulance.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Pan nad oes dwr ar gyfer injans, a all y dreigiau drwsio pethau heb gael eu stemio! When there's no water for engines, can the dragons fix things without getting steamed up!

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd - Season 1, Episode 17
Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Cyfres i blant am anifeiliaid bach y byd. Y tro hwn: anifeiliaid fferm. Series for children about the world's animals. This time: farm animals.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau Cwn a'r Cathod Bach Drygionus - Season 2, Episode 1
Patrôl Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae grwp o gathod anhapus yn gwneud llanast ym Mhorth yr Haul. Galwch am y cwn! A group of upset kittens make a mess in Adventure Bay. Pups to the rescue.

programme.title: Kim a Cêt a Twrch
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cêt ar antur hudolus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am Twrch yn y goedwig. Join Kim and Cêt as they search for the character Twrch in the woods.

programme.title: Og y Draenog Hapus Lliwiau Hapus y Dwr - Season 1, Episode 1
Og y Draenog Hapus
programme.desc: Mae Og yn siomedig iawn pan mae'r glaw yn difetha ei gynlluniau am y diwrnod. Og is really disappointed when the rain ruins his plans for the day.

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori Bonheddwr Mawr o'r Bala - Season 1, Episode 7
Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Sut mae cadw'n oer pan mae'r tywydd yn boeth? Dyna beth mae Peredur, Peri a Casi'n ceisio ei ddatrys. Peredur, Peri & Casi try to work out how to stay cool when the weather is boiling hot.

programme.title: Cymylaubychain Ara' Deg Enfys - Season 1, Episode 1
Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae Baba Gwyrdd yn weithiwr araf a phwyllog. Tybed a all ddarbwyllo Enfys i weithio'r un ffordd? Baba Gwyrdd works slowly and surely. Can Enfys be persuaded to work in the same way?

programme.title: Pablo Grwn Grwn Grwnian - Season 1, Episode 1
Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd, ond heddiw rhyw swn aflafar sy'n mynd o dan ei groen. Beth ydi'r grwnian di-baid yna? Today, an annoying buzzing noise is upsetting everyone.

programme.title: Jen a Jim a'r Cywiadur Y - Ysbryd ac Ystlum - Season 1, Episode 26
Jen a Jim a'r Cywiadur
programme.desc: Mae swn rhyfedd yn dod o do ty Cyw ac mae'r criw'n grediniol bod 'na ysbryd yn y to. There's a strange noise coming from the roof of Cyw's house and the crew are convinced it's a ghost!

programme.title: Blociau Rhif
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni De Corea - Season 1, Episode 1
Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Heddiw, teithiwn i benrhyn Corea i weld gwlad De Corea. Dyma wlad sy'n siarad yr iaith Corëeg ac yn enwog am fwyd fel Kimchi a chrefft ymladd o'r enw Taekwondo. Today we go to South Korea.

programme.title: Oli Wyn
programme.desc: Mae 'na waith adeiladu mawr yn digwydd yn Ysgol Bro Gwaun, ond cyn y gall ddechrau o ddifri, mae'n rhaid dymchwel rhai adeiladau. A look at some buildings that need to be demolished.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop Blodau'r Gwanwyn - Season 1, Episode 2
Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae ffrindiau Pip yn dod i seremoni ei arddangosfa blodau. On today's poptastic adventure, Pip's friends are coming to a ceremony for his flower display!

programme.title: Ahoi! Ysgol Bro Eirwg - Season 1, Episode 1
Ahoi!
programme.desc: A fydd y criw o forladron bach o Ysgol Bro Eirwg yn llwyddo i helpu Ben Dant a Cadi i drechu Capten Cnec a chipio'r ynys yn ôl? Can the Ysgol Bro Eirwg pirates help Ben Dant and Cadi?

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Cymry ar Gynfas Christine Mills a Osian Huw - Season 2, Episode 3
Cymry ar Gynfas
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, yr artist aml-gyfrwng Christine Mills sy'n mynd ati i greu portread o'r cerddor Osian Huw Williams. Artist Christine Mills creates a portrait of musician Osian Huw Williams. [SL]

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Ar Werth
programme.desc: Hen fanc ym Mhenmaenmawr, ty ar yr afon yng nghanol Caerdydd, a'r hen glwb Ceidwadwyr yn Aberystwyth sy'n mynd dan y morthwyl. We find out how a number of properties get on at auction.

programme.title: Y Fets
programme.desc: Tro hwn: mae angen ychydig o driniaeth ar Ruby, ci therapi i fyfyrwyr yng Ngholeg Ceredigion. This time: Dafydd is kept busy on the night shift and there are emergency cases galore.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Prynhawn Da
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

programme.title: New: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Lleisiau Eraill: Aberteifi 2023
programme.desc: Gyda/With - Adwaith, Cerys Hafana, The Joy Formidable, Sans Soucis a Colm Mac Com Iomaire, & more. Huw Stephens presents highlights from the 2023 Other Voices Festival in Cardigan.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Mae Bing a Swla yn y parc yn chwarae cewri ac yn sblasho mewn pyllau gyda'u hesgidiau glaw mawr. Bing and Swla are in the park playing at being giants and splashing in puddles.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi Helo Ddreigiau - Season 1, Episode 1
Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Mae Cadi, y gyrrwr trên, mewn trafferth pan fydd dwy ddraig ifanc yn mynd â'i hinjan stêm am daith heb ofyn. Trouble for Cadi when young dragons take her steam engine for an unplanned trip.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop Howdi Huwcyn - Season 1, Episode 1
Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Huwcyn yn cael bod yn Sheriff Pentref Papur Pop. On today's poptastic adventure, Huwcyn becomes Pop Paper City's cowboy sheriff.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd. Heddiw mae'r niwl yn gwneud i bopeth edrych yn llwyd. Sut all Pablo a'r criw ddod a lliw yn ol i'w byd? Today Pablo needs to colour some fog!

programme.title: Kim a Cêt a Twrch
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cêt ar antur hudolus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am Twrch yn y goedwig. Join Kim & Cêt as they search for the character Twrch in the forest.

programme.title: SeliGo
programme.desc: Y tro hwn mae'r cymeriadau bach glas yn cael hwyl gyda phlynjiwr. This time the crazy blue characters have fun with a plunger.

programme.title: New: Tekkers
programme.desc: Rownd arall o gemau pêl-droed o Stadiwm Tekkers gyda'r capteiniaid cystadleuol Heledd Anna, Lloyd Lewis a Huw Owen. Teams from Ysgol Godre'r Berwyn and Ysgol Llantrisant compete.

programme.title: Rygbi Pawb
programme.desc: Cyfres sy'n canolbwyntio ar rygbi ieuenctid yng Nghymru. Weekly rugby magazine with news, highlights and the latest reports.

programme.title: New: Newyddion Ni
programme.desc: Newyddion i bobl ifanc. News programme for youngsters.

programme.title: Cymru, Dad a Fi - Season 1, Episode 3
Cymru, Dad a Fi
programme.desc: Yn y rhaglen hon, bydd y ddau'n dysgu hwylio; yn ymweld ag ynysoedd Sir Benfro; yn blasu 'bara lawr'; ac yn ymarfer yoga ar ben caer Ynys Thorne. The pair continue their island hopping trip.

programme.title: Colleen Ramsey: Bywyd a Bwyd Traddodiadau Newydd - Season 2, Episode 3
Colleen Ramsey: Bywyd a Bwyd
programme.desc: Tro hwn, bydd rhai ryseitiau traddodiadol yn creu traddodiadau newydd yn y gegin. Colleen Ramsey looks at food nostalgia. This time we see her creating some new traditions in the kitchen.

programme.title: New: Yn y Lwp
programme.desc: Y cerddor Catrin Hopkins fydd yn ein tywys drwy gynnwys cerddorol diweddar Lwp. Musician Catrin Hopkins is here with Lwp's recent musical content; music videos by Adwaith, Minas & Gwilym.

programme.title: Bariau
